title: Fastest possible Movement Speed?
body:
As the Title reads - What's the fastest a Champion can move? And with what build?

EDIT: Also wanna know the fastest you can go solo without any teammates.
EDIT2: Just used {{champion:33}}  with {{summoner:6}}  {{summoner:10}}  |  {{item:3270}} {{item:3172}} {{item:3069}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3078}} and hit 2078 Max SOLO.

replies.body: I'm disappointed Sion was given a max movespeed on his ult. Before his rework I bought him and made an item set just to see how fast I could get it.

Using Rammus, as he has the most potential for high MS, I did some calculations to see what the maximum possible MS is without interference from other champions and as circumstantially real as possible. I've added parts in italic to describe how the percentages are calculated. Also note it requires pretty accurate timing in regards to actives/abilities.

Rammus, base MS of 335
Q: Powerball maximum 165% MS *(Multiplicative)*
Ghost Summoner spell 27% MS *(Additive)*
Heal Summoner Spell 30% *(Multiplicative)*
Fleet of Foot Mastery 1.5% *(Additive)*
Wanderer Mastery 5% *(Additive)*
3 times Greater Quintessence of Movement Speed 4.5% *(Additive)*
Boots of Mobility - Homeguard 105 MS + 200% *(Additive)*
Mercurial Scimitar 50% *(Additive)*
Talisman of Ascension 20 MS + 40% *(Additive)*
Youmuu's Ghostblade 20% *(Additive)*
2 times Zephyr 20% *(Additive)*
**Collectively:** 460 flat MS + 318% Additive + 165% Multiplicative + 50% Multiplicative + 30% Multiplicative
**Total:** 9936 MS
I think the highest recorded is around 14k.
